item.title: Budget
item.description: Overview The budget is the total amount of resources needed by a project, either internal and external costs. Internal costs are the working days you need to end the project, the external costs are theÂ expenses you need to take. Budget creation Choose the project in the projects pipeline by clicking on it and use the ‘Budget’ button to enter the budget creation mode. Here you can define the budget structure: choose the default areas or create a budget from a previously saved template (see budget creation for more info).
